title: Moonlit Neelam Polki Kasulaperu Haaram
features: A stunning Kasulaperu Haaram featuring a graduated design with alternating square and oval polki diamond clusters. Each polki diamond is carefully foiled in gold, enhancing its brilliance. Blue sapphires add a touch of regal elegance. Traditional Hyderabad craftsmanship with a modern, minimalist silhouette.
occasions: Festive Occasions (like Sankranti or Ugadi). A versatile piece perfect for both traditional and contemporary attire.
description: This Haaram is a unique blend of Hyderabadi craftsmanship and contemporary design. The high-quality polki diamonds, set alongside vibrant sapphires, create a captivating sparkle. Its lightweight design ensures comfortable wear, while the use of 22K gold guarantees lasting value and durability. Owning this piece is not just acquiring jewelry, but a timeless heirloom.
